data.name: AutoMap_Values
data.comment: this is an option which automatically creates a mapping/link between two objects [location: rule designer pop up - execute a method] [designtime]

data.name: Clear_AllValues
data.comment: this clears any objects which may have been configured [location: rule designer pop up - execute a method] [designtime]

data.name: Clear_AllValuesDesc
data.comment: this toolip indicates the user may clear any objects which may have been configured [location: rule designer pop up - execute a method] [designtime]

data.name: Clear_SelectedValue
data.comment: this clears any mappings which are selected[location: rule designer pop up - execute a method] [designtime]

data.name: Clear_SelectedValueDesc
data.comment: this is a tooltip which indicates the user may clear any mappings which are selected[location: rule designer pop up - execute a method] [designtime]

data.name: ListDisplay
data.comment: this is the title of a folder which contains data labels for each row [location: context tree] [runtime]

data.name: ListEdit
data.comment: Allows for adding and editing of and object

data.name: ListFooter
data.comment: this is the title of a folder which contains the labels for each aggregate [location: context tree] [runtime]

data.name: ListHeader
data.comment: this is the title of a folder which contains the labels for each column header [location: context tree] [runtime]

data.name: NoItemsToDisplay
data.comment: [no coverage: qa]

data.name: SystemValues
data.comment: [no coverage: qa]

data.name: SystemValuesBrowserCulture
data.comment: This is the locale setting of the browser [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesCurrentDate
data.comment: This is one of the options available under System Values [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesCurrentDateOnly
data.comment: This is one of the options available under System Values [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesCurrentTime
data.comment: This is one of the options available under System Values [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesCurrentUserFQN
data.comment: This is an abbreviation of "Fully Qualified Name" [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesCurrentUserName
data.comment: This is the current user's name [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesDescription
data.comment: This is a description of the user [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesDisplayName
data.comment: This is the display name of the current user [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesEmail
data.comment: This refers to the current users email address [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesErrorDetail
data.comment: This describes the error that occurred [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesErrorMessage
data.comment: This describes the error that occurred [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesErrorType
data.comment: This describes the error type [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesManagerFQN
data.comment: This is the manager's fully qualified name [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesPlatform
data.comment: This refers to the systems software platform [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesScreenHeight
data.comment: This is the height of the system's monitor [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesScreenWidth
data.comment: This is the width of the system's monitor [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: SystemValuesUserAgent
data.comment: This is referring to a software agent eg. an email reader is a mail user agent [location: context tree] [common]

data.comment: This the title of a folder which contains controls [location: context tree] [common]

data.name: Tree_DropItemMessage
data.comment: this is a watermark which appears in a textbox which indicates to users they are allowed to drop or type items into that textbox [location: rule designer pop up - execute method - output mappings] [designtime]

data.name: Tree_DropItemMessageDragOnly
data.comment: this is a watermark which appears in a textbox which indicates to users they are allowed to drop items into that textbox [location: rule designer pop up - execute method - output mappings] [designtime]

data.name: Workflows
data.comment: This the title of a folder which contains a list of workflows [location: rules designer - actions] [common]

data.name: TitleSystemNameLabel
data.comment: this is the tooltip which appears when hovering over system objects which are displayed in the context tree[to be reviewed] [location: context tree tooltip] [common]

data.name: TreeExtraHeading_SystemValuesRenderMode
data.comment: This is the title of a folder which contains modes that a View or Form can be rendered in.[location: context tree] [common]

data.name: TreeExtraHeading_SystemValuesRenderModeTooltip
data.value: Normal: Forms and Views have full functionality and require a connection to the server.\n Offline: Forms and Views have limited functionality and work without a connection to the server.
data.comment: This is the tooltip for the Mode that a View or Form can be run in. [location: context tree]

data.comment: This refers to the workflow current action[location: context tree] [common]

data.comment: This refers to the workflow current activity[location: context tree] [common]

data.comment: This the title of a folder which contains environment related settings and values [location: context tree] [common]

data.comment: This refers to the workflow current activity display name[location: context tree] [common]

data.comment: This the title of a folder which contains data fields [location: context tree] [common]
